sense.gloss: to harm, to hurt, to injure, to damage, to spoil, to mar
to fail to ..., to miss one's opportunity to ...

sdata.j: ↑注意↑↓ちゅうい↓しなくては↑駄目↑↓だめ↓だよ、さもないとまたやり↑損↑↓|そこ↓なう|よ。
sdata.e: You've got to be careful or else you'll miss it again.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑終電↑↓しゅうでん↓に↑乗↑↓の↓り|そこなう|なんていい↑気味↑↓ぎみ↓だ。
sdata.e: It serves him right that he missed the last train.

sdata.j: ↑夜↑↓よ↓↑更↑↓ふ↓かししていると↑健康↑↓けんこう↓を↑損↑↓|そこ↓なう|よ。
sdata.e: You must not stay up late, or you will hurt your health.

sdata.j: ↑料理↑↓りょうり↓↑人↑↓じん↓が↑多↑↓おお↓すぎるとスープができ|そこなう|。
sdata.e: Too many cooks spoil the broth.
